DOC.detailed_description: Temporomandibular joint dysfunction functional disorder concern abnormal functioning muscle stomatognathic system , temporomandibular joint involve dynamic movement jaw surround structure . The aim study compare level C-reactive protein patient pain painless form temporomandibular joint dysfunction . Material methods The research material consist 72 patient report prosthetic treatment temporomandibular joint dysfunction . The study group include 36 patient pain form dysfunction , control group - 36 patient painless form disorder . Each patient underwent specialize examination functional disorder , order diagnose type dysfunction commission carry study blood test concern evaluation C-reactive protein ( CRP ) level analytical laboratory . The result investigation subject statistical analysis .
DOC.criteria: Factors inclusion study : pain form temporomandibular joint dysfunction , require age range , good general state health ( particularly regard cardiac metabolic disorder ) . Factors exclusion research include : patient , emergence general disease , trauma , local inflammation .
